trans-unit.source: Unit Testing using dotnet test Sample
trans-unit.target: Unit Testing using dotnet test Sample

trans-unit.source: This sample is part of the [unit testing tutorial](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/articles/core/testing/unit-testing-with-dotnet-test) for creating applications with unit tests included.
trans-unit.target: This sample is part of the [unit testing tutorial](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/articles/core/testing/unit-testing-with-dotnet-test) for creating applications with unit tests included.

trans-unit.source: Please see that topic for detailed steps on the code for this sample.
trans-unit.target: Please see that topic for detailed steps on the code for this sample.

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates creating a library and writing effective unit tests that validate the features in that library.
trans-unit.target: This sample demonstrates creating a library and writing effective unit tests that validate the features in that library.

trans-unit.source: The example provides a service that indicates whether a number is or is not a prime number.
trans-unit.target: The example provides a service that indicates whether a number is or is not a prime number.

trans-unit.source: To build and run the sample, change to the `src/PrimeService` directory and type the following three commands:
trans-unit.target: To build and run the sample, change to the `src/PrimeService` directory and type the following three commands:

trans-unit.source: installs all the dependencies for this sample into the current directory.
trans-unit.target: installs all the dependencies for this sample into the current directory.

trans-unit.source: To run the tests, change to the `tests/PrimeService.Tests` directory and type the following three commands:
trans-unit.target: To run the tests, change to the `tests/PrimeService.Tests` directory and type the following three commands:

trans-unit.source: Note that you must run `dotnet restore` in the `src/PrimeService` directory before you can run the tests.
trans-unit.target: Note that you must run `dotnet restore` in the `src/PrimeService` directory before you can run the tests.

trans-unit.source: will follow the dependency and build both the library and unit tests projects, but it will not restore NuGet packages.
trans-unit.target: will follow the dependency and build both the library and unit tests projects, but it will not restore NuGet packages.
